actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to clarify that the farm syndicate rules of section 278(b) apply in the case of inedible fruits and nuts.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to provide that the farm syndicate rules which require capitalization of certain expenses apply in the case of inedible fruits and nuts.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to clarify that the farm syndicate rules of section 278(b) apply in the case of inedible fruits and nuts.
